content: How can we ask our kids to take personal responsibility for public health when it puts so much pressure on them? As young teens, the pressure to conform is huge. We need to step up and take a multilayered approach to covid. We need to ensure good ventilation in classrooms. 2/4

content.html: I understand what people are trying to appeal to when they say that the pressure to conform is so huge for teens But it also unwittingly elides the experience of every queer who knew they were queer as a kid I didn't have a choice as to being nonconformist or not, I just *was*
content.value:
I understand what people are trying to appeal to when they say that the pressure to conform is so huge for teens

But it also unwittingly elides the experience of every queer who knew they were queer as a kid

I didn't have a choice as to being nonconformist or not, I just *was*
